findMatches(uint256).details: Single-loop over registered users (bounded by MAX_USERS and current userCount)

params._farcaster: optional farcaster handle (empty string if none)
params._skillToLearn: skill the user wants to learn (string -> hashed)
params._skillToTeach: skill the user will teach (string -> hashed)
params._twitter: optional twitter handle (empty string if none)

params._skillToLearn: new skill to learn (empty string to keep unchanged)
params._skillToTeach: new skill to teach (empty string to keep unchanged)
params._userId: id of the caller's user entry

findMatches(uint256).notice: Find reciprocal matches for given userId: a user's skillToTeach must equal other's skillToLearn AND user's skillToLearn must equal other's skillToTeach

getAllUsers().notice: Return all registered users (capped by MAX_USERS)

getUserByWallet(address).notice: Return a user by wallet address (or id 0 if not registered)

getUserMatches(uint256).notice: Return matches for a single user

myUserId().notice: Get user id for the caller (0 if not registered)

register(string,string,string,string,str.notice: Register a new user (one per wallet)

skillToHash(string).notice: Helper to convert a skill string to the onchain stored bytes32 hash

updateProfile(uint256,string,string,stri.notice: Update mutable profile fields. Name and wallet are immutable.
